explanation: [0-0] A young man in a burgundy T-shirt, wearing headphones, sits in front of a black background wall. In front of him is a snare drum covered with a purple cloth. The man holds a roll of yellow tape in his left hand and a bag of white powder in his right hand. He smiles and looks at the upper right corner of the screen.

[0-4] Then, a pale hand appears on the screen behind him, slowly climbing up from the bottom of the screen. The hand continues to crawl across the screen and spreads its fingers. The young man in the burgundy T-shirt controls the hand on the screen with his hand.

[4-10] Next, the young man in the burgundy T-shirt hits the small brush on the snare drum. Flames burst out from the floor on the screen. The screen switches to a young woman in a black uniform with a ponytail, playing the cello. The screen switches again, this time to a scene of an explosion with fire and smoke everywhere. The screen returns to the pale hand, which continues to crawl across the screen as the man leans forward, his hand crawling forward.
